modName: Low Weight Trade Tools and Firewood
summary: 1 lb pickaxe and axe + 0.5 lb firewood
descriptionHtml:
Gives pickaxes and wood-chopping axes a weight of 1, and firewood a weight of 0.5

Useful to those who use crafting overhaul mods which make firewood more important in the crafting process.

There are a couple of mods already on here that make similar changes, but I wanted to condense my own take on it into one mod.
author: scottfair

files.name: low weight trade tools and firewood
files.fileName: low weight trade tools and firewood-12124-1-0.rar
files.changelogHtml: Nothing has been changed other to add a Dragonborn DLC version for those who want a low weight version of the Ancient Pickaxe in addition to all the original modifications. Just make sure you ONLY USE ONE of these 2 files.

files.name: TradeToolsDragonborn
